featured.text: In 1955, Anderson became the first black soloist to sing with the Metropolitan Opera of New York City.

definition.zh_def: 獨奏者，指在音樂表演中單獨演奏或演唱的人。
definition.en_def: A musician or singer who performs alone, especially in a concert or recital.
definition.example: The soloist captivated the audience with her stunning performance.
